data.field:
The [id://59438] keep the site free of "trash" (broken nodes) by fixing bad HTML formatting and remediating obstructive titles. See [id://324820] for more details.

Note: In times past, this order was known as 'editors', but the name was changed because their job is really just to clean up messes, not to serve in any kind of editorial capacity. See [id://324820] for more details. [vroom] announced the creation of the original group [id://59807|here].
